document.full_text: u.s. crude oil futures rose $2 on wednesday, extending their rise after a government report showed a big, unexpected drop in distillate stockpiles in the united states last week which also helped push heating oil futures up sharply.
document.title: u.s. crude up $2 on lift from distillate stocks drop
lines_and_colors: u.s. crude oil futures rose $2 on wednesday, extending their rise after a government report showed a big, unexpected drop in distillate stockpiles in the united states last week which also helped push heating oil futures up sharply.
